title: Preset Runes
body:
Hi;

If I send your agents a ticket to remove these preset runes, would that be done?

In the past, I asked for few champs and old runes to be removed from my collection and they did it, so I figured the same.

thanks.

replies.body:
If you're talking about the preset rune pages, writing in a ticket won't remove them either. :/

Currently there's an option to hide the preset rune pages in your Collection, but it looks like that option hasn't made it to champion select. We're still wanting to hear feedback from players on how we can improve the new runes system (that's kinda how we got the "hide preset pages" checkbox in the first place). Send us your feedback on the [gameplay board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) so our devs can get more awareness on this idea.
